CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(SLA_1_status__c, ""), NULL, IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(SLA_1_status__c, "Lost")), OR( ISNULL(Timestamp_Latest_Opp_Contact_Role__c), Timestamp_Latest_Opp_Contact_Role__c < Timestamp_Became_a_MQL_Contact_Latest__c ), ISPICKVAL(Account.Stage_ACM__c, "Prospect") ), (NOW() - Timestamp_Became_a_MQL_Contact_Latest__c) * 24, IF( AND( NOT(ISNULL(Timestamp_Latest_Opp_Contact_Role__c)), Timestamp_Latest_Opp_Contact_Role__c > Timestamp_Became_a_MQL_Contact_Latest__c ), (Timestamp_Latest_Opp_Contact_Role__c - Timestamp_Became_a_MQL_Contact_Latest__c) * 24, IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(SLA_1_status__c, "Lost"), Account.Timestamp_Acc_Lifecycle_Stage_Outbound__c > Timestamp_Became_a_MQL_Contact_Latest__c ), (Account.Timestamp_Acc_Lifecycle_Stage_Outbound__c - Timestamp_Became_a_MQL_Contact_Latest__c) * 24, NULL ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: SLA 1 Time taken
